metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7728 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Exempi through 2.4.4.XMPFiles/source/FileHandlers/TIFF_Handler.cpp mishandles a case of a zerolength, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read in the MD5Update()function in third-party/zuid/interfaces/MD5.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7728` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.4.5-2
libexempi3 - 2.4.5-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: exempi package in esm-infra/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.5-2').
